page.title: 04SOCIAL LIFE-SUTTON ST JAMES
page.content: Although Sutton St James is a small village, there are quite a lot of things going on, especially during the winter.On Thursdays the Brownies meet in the Scout Hut to play games, make things, and to attempt different skills to earn badges. In the summer they go on pack holiday. Last year they went to Great Yarmouth. On Wednesdays there is ballroom dancing, where you learn dances like the Boston Two-step, Lilac Waltz, and others. A lot of our girls have won the gold and silver medals. The Cubs also meet in the Scout Hut, but they use the school field for football.The Cubs go on camping weekends. There are also Guides for girls of ten to sixteen,but we have no Scouts as there is no-one to take them.
